page.title: 08A FAMILY WEEKEND (continued)
page.content: and crisps.Afterwards I watched television until bedtime at 9.00pm.Mum and Dad had supper at 8.pm.They had smoked salmon,prawns and wine. { {Sunday:}Sunday started for me at 7.10am.Everyone else was up by 8.15am. Dad and I had similar breakfast of egg,bread and orange juice.At 9.30am the whole family went to St.Mary's church for a special service about missionaries.Lunch was at 1.00pm consisting of beef,yorkshire pudding, roast potatoes,peas and carrots. For pudding we had ice_cream.At 2.20pm we went to the P.T.A. Family Fun Walk.We had to answer questions,quizzes and do games during the walk.When we returned home I played football outside until teatime.I had cheese spread,bread, crisps,a KitKat and two chocolate biscuits; then I watched some television and went to bed at 8.30pm.
